title: Marcel Lambert (footballer)
text: Marcel Lambert (1876 – unknown death) was a French <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who competed in the <a href="1900%20Olympic%20Games">1900 Olympic Games</a>. In Paris he won a silver medal as a member of <a href="Club%20Fran%C3%A7ais">Club Français</a> club team.
